element.definition: The value of the header e.g. "application/xml".
element.comments: If header element is specified, then value is required.  No conversions will be done by Test Engine e.g. "xml" to "application/xml+fhir".  The values will be set in HTTP headers "as-is".  Test engines do have to look for placeholders (${}) and replace the variable placeholders with the variable values at runtime before sending the request.
